about_the_game:
Green Cube is an arcade game for really skilled players. This is my first game made in unity, so there may be various bugs, if you come across any, let me know. In Green Cube you have to kiwka (dodge) obstacles with yours, as name suggests, Green Cube!. Easy controls, such as moving left, moving right, and thats it!

Features


  • Short but hard levels

  • Easy controls, only strafe left or right

  • Fast acceleration, so you need to show how good your reaction time is

  • Precision parts, where you need to stay calm and dont touch obstacles

  • Selfmade music!

I hope someone smash Their keyboard after playing my game. (Not really I'm joking (I'm not))

name: Green Cube

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
